data.comment: Could someone point out to me, what the benefit of winning the group is? I mean, both finalists of the group will qualify for the Spring Finals? So what is the point of fighting for 1st? Braggin’ rights?

replies.comment: double the money plus better seeding

Better seeding in the Finals for the first match IIRC
And you win more money as group winner

data.comment: NiP have the stream running on a big TV in the same room they're playing in.Are we doing this whole shenanigans again now? Didn't ESIC say there are gonna be consequences from now on? Getting a little tired of this.

replies.comment: It's not the stream, it's the coach PC hooked up to the TV
Doesn’t big currently has the stream on a big screen?

data.comment: Blast has the best presentation and production of all the ongoing series at the moment, my favourite without a doubt. That sounded like a paid advertisement, but I really just like the series
